issue.title: thegioididong.com is blocked by Stealth mode
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

3.6.9

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other(specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

thegioididong.com

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

Protect from DPI

### Add your comment and screenshots

I find that thegioididong.com is already in the list:

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/425669ced45729794a5d75e2554b959fb0a7bf2e/EnglishFilter/sections/allowlist_stealth.txt#L26

but it's not in: https://filters.adtidy.org/android/filters/2_optimized.txt

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

These ads should be already blocked by this rule:

```
||com/banners/$image,object,subdocument,domain=~pingdom.com|~thetvdb.com|~tooltrucks.com
```

# Creating the pull request > Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\ > If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\ > It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/en/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\ > Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it ## Prerequisites ### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms - [x] This is not an ad/bug report; - [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project; - [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes; - [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure. ## What problem does the pull request fix? ### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section - [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers; - [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly; - [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website; - [ ] Missed analytics or tracker; - [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc; - [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc; - [x] Filters maintenance. ## What issue is being fixed? Added rules for removing newly added tracking parameters (after #99685) ### Enter the issue address N/A ### Add your comment and screenshots #### If possible, a screenshot of a page or application should not be cropped too much. Otherwise, it is not always clear where the element is located 0. **DO NOT** upload screenshots with sexually explicit material on GitHub directly.\ Instead, upload it to a third-party image hosting and post the link to it without preview (!) here.\ Also, mention if the link leads to NSFW content; 1. Add screenshots of the problem. You can drag and drop images or paste them from clipboard Use `
` tag to hide screenshots under the spoiler; 2. comment.body:
No, it's not a typo.
Here - `https://param.com.tr/en/` is used `param.com.tr/en/dist/js/gdpr-cookie.js`, so a rule like this:
```
||param.com.tr/dist/js/gdpr-cookie.js
```
will be not block it.

Alternatively something like this:
```
/dist/js/gdpr-cookie.js$domain=param.com.tr
```
also would be okay, but I think that it's not necessary to change current rule.

comment.body: The gaps in each column are blocked promotional items. Due to the design of the site assumes line-by-line filling, these gaps cannot be filled with products from the next line. Therefore, these leftovers cannot be fixed because they are part of the site layout. Also, you can disable the `AdGuard Other Annoyances filter` and the gaps will be filled with site suggestions.

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.vodafone.hu/myvodafone](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.vodafone.hu%2Fmyvodafone) ### Comment Username: `@alexaka1` > On the main https://www.vodafone.hu website, I click the Login button at the top right. Then the browser enters an infinite redirect loop, from https://www.vodafone.hu/myvodafone to https://auth.vodafone.hu/oxauth/auth/login-captcha.htm and repeat. This infinite redirect loop doesn't stop until I turn off adguard for vodefone.hu domain. > > Once turned off, the browser stops on https://auth.vodafone.hu/oxauth/auth/login-captcha.htm URL where I'm required to enter my credentials. Once I enter my credentials, an error page appears telling me the login was unsuccessful. I have to turn off adguard for auth.vodafone.hu subdomain as well, and only then can I login to the website with success. ### Screenshots

comment.body:
В приложении рекламу не убрать, но в браузере Сафари напротив она блокируется.
Включите продвинутую защиту, обновите фильтры (дождитесь их применения в окне программы примерно минуту), затем откройте сайт.
Если не помогло, то перезапустите контент блокеры в настройках Сафари (также нужно подождать в настройках примерно минуту).

issue.title: www.vodafone.hu
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.vodafone.hu/myvodafone](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.vodafone.hu%2Fmyvodafone) ### Comment Username: `@alexaka1` > On the main https://www.vodafone.hu website, I click the Login button at the top right. Then the browser enters an infinite redirect loop, from https://www.vodafone.hu/myvodafone to https://auth.vodafone.hu/oxauth/auth/login-captcha.htm and repeat. This infinite redirect loop doesn't stop until I turn off adguard for vodefone.hu domain. > > Once turned off, the browser stops on https://auth.vodafone.hu/oxauth/auth/login-captcha.htm URL where I'm required to enter my credentials. Once I enter my credentials, an error page appears telling me the login was unsuccessful. I have to turn off adguard for auth.vodafone.hu subdomain as well, and only then can I login to the website with success. ### Screenshots

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.vodafone.hu/myvodafone](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.vodafone.hu%2Fmyvodafone) ### Comment Username: `@alexaka1` > On the main https://www.vodafone.hu website, I click the Login button at the top right. Then the browser enters an infinite redirect loop, from https://www.vodafone.hu/myvodafone to https://auth.vodafone.hu/oxauth/auth/login-captcha.htm and repeat. This infinite redirect loop doesn't stop until I turn off adguard for vodefone.hu domain. > > Once turned off, the browser stops on https://auth.vodafone.hu/oxauth/auth/login-captcha.htm URL where I'm required to enter my credentials. Once I enter my credentials, an error page appears telling me the login was unsuccessful. I have to turn off adguard for auth.vodafone.hu subdomain as well, and only then can I login to the website with success. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/Dy0sjla.png)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/Sh8oceL.png)

Send Do-Not-Track header,
